name: wavy rocket
description:
Wavy Rocket is a simple and addictive endless runner mobile game. Control the little ship gliding through a beautiful exotic world. Collect coins and unlock cool spaceships. Relaxed in the calm, zen-like background music.

FEATURES

- Addictive one-touch gameplay.
- 30 built-in cool, unlock-able spaceships.
- Daily reward system.

- In-app purchasing
- Leaderboards and achievements
- Recording gameplay in realtime, then sharing GIF images to social networks
- Sharing screenshots to social networks
- Push notification

Michael J. Brown

Mike Brown Animations,LLC
